title: Adhesive formed from bee spit and flower oil could form basis of new glues

title_detail.value: Adhesive formed from bee spit and flower oil could form basis of new glues

summary: Researchers are looking to a bee 'glue' as a model for a bioinspired adhesive because of its unique properties and ability to remain sticky through a range of conditions.

summary_detail.value: Researchers are looking to a bee 'glue' as a model for a bioinspired adhesive because of its unique properties and ability to remain sticky through a range of conditions.
